tutorials.title: Basic Flip Tricks
tutorials.description: Master the fundamental flip techniques including front flips, back flips, and 360 spins. Learn proper finger positioning and timing for maximum air time.

tutorials.title: Rail Grinding Mastery
tutorials.description: Perfect your rail grinding skills with step-by-step instructions on balance, speed control, and trick combinations while grinding on rails and ledges.

tutorials.title: Advanced Air Tricks
tutorials.description: Take your skills to the next level with complex aerial maneuvers including double flips, cork spins, and combination tricks that will impress any crowd.

tutorials.title: Street Style Combos
tutorials.description: Learn to chain multiple tricks together in fluid combinations. Master the art of trick transitions and create your own signature style.

tutorials.title: Ramp Techniques
tutorials.description: Conquer massive ramps with proper approach angles, speed management, and landing techniques. Build confidence for bigger air and more complex tricks.

tutorials.title: Urban Course Navigation
tutorials.description: Navigate through complex urban environments with precision. Learn to read terrain, plan your line, and adapt to different obstacles and challenges.
